Congrats Barrett!!  We <3 you here at eHire!  Thank you for EVERYTHING you do.  We hope to see y'all out there supporting the top Marketing talent in Atlanta on Nov 6th at the Cobb Energy Center.  Thanks TAG Marketing!

eHire is the unique combination of two successful Atlanta based recruiting businesses with three local successful entrepreneurs forming a new organization that seeks to provide unparalleled recruiting services to enterprise and emerging businesses in the areas of Information Technology, Sales and Business Development and Executive search.  eHire was founded on a simple idea: elevate recruiting to its highest level. We do this by developing close relationships and being intricately woven into the technology industry through our personal networks, community involvement, professional alliances and business partnerships.At eHire, we are challenging the status quo in IT Staffing!  We are committed to changing the lives of our clients and candidates, as well as giving back to the community.  Our firm was founded on the idea of quality over quantity, and has maintained that fundamental principle since inception.  We have a solid industry reputation of being exceptionally consultative, and for taking the time to provide a well thought out strategic solution to our client's challenges.More information can be found on our website at www.ehire.com.

The Association of IT Professionals (AITP) is an organization comprised of career-minded individuals who seek to expand their potential through events, networking, mentoring, and socialization. The organization follows a strict code of ethics, instills professionalism, and defines obligations to management, fellow members, society, the College and University, employers, and the country. AITP members span every level of the IT industry and discipline from Support roles on up to CIO, withing Software Development, Infrastructure, Data Warehousing and analytics, Security, etc. AITP Atlanta holds monthly dinner meetings on the 3rd Thursday of every month at the Crowne Plaza Ravinia across from Perimeter Mall between 5:30pm and 8:00pm. Please see our website (http://www.aitpatlanta.org) for topics and registration information - we hope to see you there!!!

The Goal is a technology-based consulting firm that specializes in providing companies with the technical resources required to handle complex business-critical projects in both the commercial and federal practices. The Goal was founded in Dulles, VA in 2002 as a certified small minority-owned disadvantaged business and currently has over 180 consultants nationwide. We pride ourselves on hiring the best of breed consultants and providing top notch customer service.

•	Manage the end-to-end recruitment process, including identifying selection criteria, developing competency-based questions, sourcing and screening applicants, interviewing candidates in conjunction with the hiring manager, verifying references; and making salary recommendations.•	Lead continuous improvement initiatives focusing on key recruitment metrics including:  time to hire, quality of hire and cost per hire•	Consult with hiring managers to determine the skills needed and staffing requirements•	Identify issues which impact recruiting activity, analyze and recommend action plans to meet staffing requirements given the market and other internal / external variables•	Develop and implement a variety of strategies to market the organization to potential candidates, advertise openings, and solicit qualified applicants•	Provide consultation and guidance to hiring managers on candidate selection, salary determination, and offers of employment

•	Partnered with company leadership and sales management to develop and execute effective recruiting strategies to deliver top quality staff and meet hiring plans.•	Contributed as a positive member of the recruiting team, supporting team members and assisting them with their individual success.•	Educated and trained team members on processes and best practices for recruiting qualified, diverse talent. •	Well versed in full lifecycle recruiting components including, but not limited to, sourcing, qualifying, networking, skills assessment, job analysis, wage and salary trends, and relationship management.•	Strong success guiding candidates through the interview process including prescreening, on-site interviews with various levels of management, debrief, facilitation of feedback and the coordination of offers.•	Strategically identified new business development opportunities through recruitment efforts.Worked extensively with clients like: 3M, Boar's Head, ABB / Ventyx, Accenture, Accenture Federal, Avanade, McKesson, and many others.

Kelly Rodich
Corporate Talent Acquisition
August 3, 2015, Tony was a client of Kelly’s

In order to write an accurate and useful recommendation for someone, you have to look past a friendship and be able to articulate the important aspects of your experience and what other people can expect from that person.  My five key words that come to mind about my professional experience with Kelly Rodich are Listened, Summarized, Questioned, Collaborated, Executed.  Those five simple words coupled with Kelly’s positive attitude, knowledge of the industry, respectful approach to a sensitive subject, and dedication to customer satisfaction made it easy for her to narrow my search down to two great companies.  In the end, I can’t be any happier to have chosen Kelly Rodich as my advocate, Satori Source as my partner, and The Goal as my home.

summary: Tony is an enthusiastic, dependable, self-motivated individual with a creative ability and a true passion for helping people.  He has a proven ability to learn fast, work productively and deliver high-quality results in challenging environments.  He has over 15 years of extensive experience in full life-cycle recruitment coupled with a unique blend of account management, new business development, and training.Tony is committed to providing quality results to his colleagues and customers; locally, nationally and internationally.  He is committed to building strong relationships based on honesty, trust and mutual respect.  He is committed to growing an organization using integrity, patience, confidence and character.Competencies include• Management • Recruitment • Leadership • Employee Development • Process Improvement • Business Development • Training • Employee / Customer Relationships
